name: Mental Math Advanced
description:
The prototype of a mental arithmetic game. You can practice the basic arithmetic operations of addition, subtraction, division and multiplication in various challenges.

The aim is to put the generated operators and numbers in the correct order so that the displayed result is achieved. But beware: Not all operators and numbers can be used to solve the task.

Only basic arithmetic operations and integers are currently supported. Next, floating point numbers, square roots, and power calculations are added.
